mapper.select: SELECT d.dept_name, COUNT(e.emp_id) emp_count FROM emp e RIGHT OUTER JOIN dept d ON e.emp_dept_id = d.dept_id GROUP BY d.dept_name
SELECT j.job_name "jobName", NVL(trunc(AVG(e.emp_salary),2),0) "avgSal" FROM emp e RIGHT OUTER JOIN job j ON e.emp_job_id = j.job_id GROUP BY j.job_name
SELECT d.dept_name "deptName", NVL(MAX(e.emp_salary),0) "maxSal", NVL(MIN(e.emp_salary),0) "minSal" FROM emp e RIGHT OUTER JOIN dept d ON e.emp_dept_id = d.dept_id GROUP BY d.dept_name

SELECT m.*,m."deptName", m."deptMaxSal" / 10 "deptMaxSalLevel", m."deptMinSal" / 10 "deptMinSalLevel" FROM (SELECT d.dept_name "deptName", nvl(trunc(AVG(e.emp_salary),2),0) "deptAvgSal", nvl(MAX(e.emp_salary),0) "deptMaxSal", nvl(MIN(e.emp_salary),0) "deptMinSal", COUNT(e.emp_id) "deptEmpCount" FROM dept d LEFT OUTER JOIN emp e ON d.dept_id = e.emp_dept_id GROUP BY d.dept_name) m
